class.name: TextEdit
class.description: A multiline text editor. It also has limited facilities for editing code, such as syntax highlighting support. For more advanced facilities for editing code, see [CodeEdit]. [b]Note:[/b] Most viewport, caret and edit methods contain a [code]caret_index[/code] argument for [member caret_multiple] support. The argument should be one of the following: [code]-1[/code] for all carets, [code]0[/code] for the main caret, or greater than [code]0[/code] for secondary carets. [b]Note:[/b] When holding down [kbd]Alt[/kbd], the vertical scroll wheel will scroll 5 times as fast as it would normally do. This also works in the Godot script editor.

method.name: _backspace
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user presses the backspace key.

method.name: _copy
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a copy operation.

method.name: _cut
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a cut operation.

method.name: _handle_unicode_input
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user types in the provided key [param unicode_char].

method.name: _paste
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a paste operation.

method.name: _paste_primary_clipboard
method.description: Override this method to define what happens when the user performs a paste operation with middle mouse button. [b]Note:[/b] This method is only implemented on Linux.

method.name: add_caret
method.description: Adds a new caret at the given location. Returns the index of the new caret, or [code]-1[/code] if the location is invalid.

method.name: add_caret_at_carets
method.description: Adds an additional caret above or below every caret. If [param below] is true the new caret will be added below and above otherwise.

method.name: add_gutter
method.description: Register a new gutter to this [TextEdit]. Use [param at] to have a specific gutter order. A value of [code]-1[/code] appends the gutter to the right.

method.name: add_selection_for_next_occurrence
method.description: Adds a selection and a caret for the next occurrence of the current selection. If there is no active selection, selects word under caret.

method.name: adjust_carets_after_edit
method.description: Reposition the carets affected by the edit. This assumes edits are applied in edit order, see [method get_caret_index_edit_order].

method.name: adjust_viewport_to_caret
method.description: Adjust the viewport so the caret is visible.

method.name: backspace
method.description: Called when the user presses the backspace key. Can be overridden with [method _backspace].

method.name: begin_complex_operation
method.description: Starts a multipart edit. All edits will be treated as one action until [method end_complex_operation] is called.

method.name: center_viewport_to_caret
method.description: Centers the viewport on the line the editing caret is at. This also resets the [member scroll_horizontal] value to [code]0[/code].

method.name: clear
method.description: Performs a full reset of [TextEdit], including undo history.

method.name: clear_undo_history
method.description: Clears the undo history.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copies the current text selection. Can be overridden with [method _copy].

method.name: cut
method.description: Cut's the current selection. Can be overridden with [method _cut].

method.name: delete_selection
method.description: Deletes the selected text.

method.name: deselect
method.description: Deselects the current selection.

method.name: end_action
method.description: Marks the end of steps in the current action started with [method start_action].

method.name: end_complex_operation
method.description: Ends a multipart edit, started with [method begin_complex_operation]. If called outside a complex operation, the current operation is pushed onto the undo/redo stack.

method.name: get_caret_column
method.description: Returns the column the editing caret is at.

method.name: get_caret_count
method.description: Returns the number of carets in this [TextEdit].

method.name: get_caret_draw_pos
method.description: Returns the caret pixel draw position.

method.name: get_caret_index_edit_order
method.description: Returns a list of caret indexes in their edit order, this done from bottom to top. Edit order refers to the way actions such as [method insert_text_at_caret] are applied.

method.name: get_caret_line
method.description: Returns the line the editing caret is on.

method.name: get_caret_wrap_index
method.description: Returns the wrap index the editing caret is on.

method.name: get_first_non_whitespace_column
method.description: Returns the first column containing a non-whitespace character.

method.name: get_first_visible_line
method.description: Returns the first visible line.

method.name: get_gutter_count
method.description: Returns the number of gutters registered.

method.name: get_gutter_name
method.description: Returns the name of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: get_gutter_type
method.description: Returns the type of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: get_gutter_width
method.description: Returns the width of the gutter at the given index.

method.name: get_h_scroll_bar
method.description: Returns the [HScrollBar] used by [TextEdit].

method.name: get_indent_level
method.description: Returns the number of spaces and [code]tab * tab_size[/code] before the first char.

method.name: get_last_full_visible_line
method.description: Returns the last visible line. Use [method get_last_full_visible_line_wrap_index] for the wrap index.

method.name: get_last_full_visible_line_wrap_index
method.description: Returns the last visible wrap index of the last visible line.

method.name: get_last_unhidden_line
method.description: Returns the last unhidden line in the entire [TextEdit].

method.name: get_line
method.description: Returns the text of a specific line.

method.name: get_line_background_color
method.description: Returns the current background color of the line. [code]Color(0, 0, 0, 0)[/code] is returned if no color is set.

method.name: get_line_column_at_pos
method.description: Returns the line and column at the given position. In the returned vector, [code]x[/code] is the column, [code]y[/code] is the line. If [param allow_out_of_bounds] is [code]false[/code] and the position is not over the text, both vector values will be set to [code]-1[/code].

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of lines in the text.

method.name: get_line_gutter_icon
method.description: Returns the icon currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_gutter_item_color
method.description: Returns the color currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_gutter_metadata
method.description: Returns the metadata currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_gutter_text
method.description: Returns the text currently in [param gutter] at [param line].

method.name: get_line_height
method.description: Returns the maximum value of the line height among all lines. [b]Note:[/b] The return value is influenced by [theme_item line_spacing] and [theme_item font_size]. And it will not be less than [code]1[/code].

method.name: get_line_width
method.description: Returns the width in pixels of the [param wrap_index] on [param line].

method.name: get_line_wrap_count
method.description: Returns the number of times the given line is wrapped.

method.name: get_line_wrap_index_at_column
method.description: Returns the wrap index of the given line column.

method.name: get_line_wrapped_text
method.description: Returns an array of [String]s representing each wrapped index.

method.name: get_local_mouse_pos
method.description: Returns the local mouse position adjusted for the text direction.

method.name: get_menu
get_minimap_line_at_pos
method.description: Returns the equivalent minimap line at [param position].

method.name: get_minimap_visible_lines
method.description: Returns the number of lines that may be drawn on the minimap.

method.name: get_next_visible_line_index_offset_from
method.description: Similar to [method get_next_visible_line_offset_from], but takes into account the line wrap indexes. In the returned vector, [code]x[/code] is the line, [code]y[/code] is the wrap index.

method.name: get_next_visible_line_offset_from
method.description: Returns the count to the next visible line from [param line] to [code]line + visible_amount[/code]. Can also count backwards. For example if a [TextEdit] has 5 lines with lines 2 and 3 hidden, calling this with [code]line = 1, visible_amount = 1[/code] would return 3.

method.name: get_pos_at_line_column
method.description: Returns the local position for the given [param line] and [param column]. If [code]x[/code] or [code]y[/code] of the returned vector equal [code]-1[/code], the position is outside of the viewable area of the control. [b]Note:[/b] The Y position corresponds to the bottom side of the line. Use [method get_rect_at_line_column] to get the top side position.

method.name: get_rect_at_line_column
method.description: Returns the local position and size for the grapheme at the given [param line] and [param column]. If [code]x[/code] or [code]y[/code] position of the returned rect equal [code]-1[/code], the position is outside of the viewable area of the control. [b]Note:[/b] The Y position of the returned rect corresponds to the top side of the line, unlike [method get_pos_at_line_column] which returns the bottom side.

method.name: get_saved_version
method.description: Returns the last tagged saved version from [method tag_saved_version].

method.name: get_scroll_pos_for_line
method.description: Returns the scroll position for [param wrap_index] of [param line].

method.name: get_selected_text
method.description: Returns the text inside the selection of a caret, or all the carets if [param caret_index] is its default value [code]-1[/code].

method.name: get_selection_column
method.description: Returns the original start column of the selection.

method.name: get_selection_from_column
method.description: Returns the selection begin column.

method.name: get_selection_from_line
method.description: Returns the selection begin line.

method.name: get_selection_line
method.description: Returns the original start line of the selection.

method.name: get_selection_mode
method.description: Returns the current selection mode.

method.name: get_selection_to_column
method.description: Returns the selection end column.

method.name: get_selection_to_line
method.description: Returns the selection end line.

method.name: get_tab_size
method.description: Returns the [TextEdit]'s' tab size.

method.name: get_total_gutter_width
method.description: Returns the total width of all gutters and internal padding.

method.name: get_total_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of lines that may be drawn.

method.name: get_v_scroll_bar
method.description: Returns the [VScrollBar] of the [TextEdit].

method.name: get_version
method.description: Returns the current version of the [TextEdit]. The version is a count of recorded operations by the undo/redo history.

method.name: get_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of visible lines, including wrapped text.

method.name: get_visible_line_count_in_range
method.description: Returns the total number of visible + wrapped lines between the two lines.

method.name: get_word_at_pos
method.description: Returns the word at [param position].

method.name: get_word_under_caret
method.description: Returns a [String] text with the word under the caret's location.

method.name: has_ime_text
method.description: Returns if the user has IME text.

method.name: has_redo
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a "redo" action is available.

method.name: has_selection
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the user has selected text.

method.name: has_undo
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an "undo" action is available.

method.name: insert_line_at
method.description: Inserts a new line with [param text] at [param line].

method.name: insert_text_at_caret
method.description: Insert the specified text at the caret position.

method.name: is_caret_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the caret is visible on the screen.

method.name: is_dragging_cursor
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the user is dragging their mouse for scrolling or selecting.

method.name: is_gutter_clickable
method.description: Returns whether the gutter is clickable.

method.name: is_gutter_drawn
method.description: Returns whether the gutter is currently drawn.

method.name: is_gutter_overwritable
method.description: Returns whether the gutter is overwritable.

method.name: is_line_gutter_clickable
method.description: Returns whether the gutter on the given line is clickable.

method.name: is_line_wrapped
method.description: Returns if the given line is wrapped.

method.name: is_menu_visible
method.description: Returns whether the menu is visible. Use this instead of [code]get_menu().visible[/code] to improve performance (so the creation of the menu is avoided).

method.name: is_mouse_over_selection
method.description: Returns whether the mouse is over selection. If [param edges] is [code]true[/code], the edges are considered part of the selection.

method.name: is_overtype_mode_enabled
method.description: Returns whether the user is in overtype mode.

method.name: menu_option
method.description: Executes a given action as defined in the [enum MenuItems] enum.

method.name: merge_gutters
method.description: Merge the gutters from [param from_line] into [param to_line]. Only overwritable gutters will be copied.

method.name: merge_overlapping_carets
method.description: Merges any overlapping carets. Will favor the newest caret, or the caret with a selection. [b]Note:[/b] This is not called when a caret changes position but after certain actions, so it is possible to get into a state where carets overlap.

method.name: paste
method.description: Paste at the current location. Can be overridden with [method _paste].

method.name: paste_primary_clipboard
method.description: Pastes the primary clipboard.

method.name: redo
method.description: Perform redo operation.

method.name: remove_caret
method.description: Removes the given caret index. [b]Note:[/b] This can result in adjustment of all other caret indices.

method.name: remove_gutter
method.description: Removes the gutter from this [TextEdit].

method.name: remove_secondary_carets
method.description: Removes all additional carets.

method.name: remove_text
method.description: Removes text between the given positions. [b]Note:[/b] This does not adjust the caret or selection, which as a result it can end up in an invalid position.

method.name: search
select
method.description: Perform selection, from line/column to line/column. If [member selecting_enabled] is [code]false[/code], no selection will occur.

method.name: select_all
method.description: Select all the text. If [member selecting_enabled] is [code]false[/code], no selection will occur.

method.name: select_word_under_caret
method.description: Selects the word under the caret.

method.name: set_caret_column
method.description: Moves the caret to the specified [param column] index. If [param adjust_viewport] is [code]true[/code], the viewport will center at the caret position after the move occurs. [b]Note:[/b] If supporting multiple carets this will not check for any overlap. See [method merge_overlapping_carets].

method.name: set_caret_line
method.description: Moves the caret to the specified [param line] index. If [param adjust_viewport] is [code]true[/code], the viewport will center at the caret position after the move occurs. If [param can_be_hidden] is [code]true[/code], the specified [param line] can be hidden. [b]Note:[/b] If supporting multiple carets this will not check for any overlap. See [method merge_overlapping_carets].

method.name: set_gutter_clickable
method.description: Sets the gutter as clickable. This will change the mouse cursor to a pointing hand when hovering over the gutter.

method.name: set_gutter_custom_draw
method.description: Set a custom draw method for the gutter. The callback method must take the following args: [code]line: int, gutter: int, Area: Rect2[/code].

method.name: set_gutter_draw
method.description: Sets whether the gutter should be drawn.

method.name: set_gutter_name
method.description: Sets the name of the gutter.

method.name: set_gutter_overwritable
method.description: Sets the gutter to overwritable. See [method merge_gutters].

method.name: set_gutter_type
method.description: Sets the type of gutter.

method.name: set_gutter_width
method.description: Set the width of the gutter.

method.name: set_line
method.description: Sets the text for a specific line.

method.name: set_line_as_center_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the center of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_as_first_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the top of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_as_last_visible
method.description: Positions the [param wrap_index] of [param line] at the bottom of the viewport.

method.name: set_line_background_color
method.description: Sets the current background color of the line. Set to [code]Color(0, 0, 0, 0)[/code] for no color.

method.name: set_line_gutter_clickable
method.description: If [param clickable] is [code]true[/code], makes the [param gutter] on [param line] clickable. See [signal gutter_clicked].

method.name: set_line_gutter_icon
method.description: Sets the icon for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param icon].

method.name: set_line_gutter_item_color
method.description: Sets the color for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param color].

method.name: set_line_gutter_metadata
method.description: Sets the metadata for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param metadata].

method.name: set_line_gutter_text
method.description: Sets the text for [param gutter] on [param line] to [param text].

method.name: set_overtype_mode_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], sets the user into overtype mode. When the user types in this mode, it will override existing text.

method.name: set_search_flags
method.description: Sets the search [param flags]. This is used with [method set_search_text] to highlight occurrences of the searched text. Search flags can be specified from the [enum SearchFlags] enum.

method.name: set_search_text
method.description: Sets the search text. See [method set_search_flags].

method.name: set_selection_mode
method.description: Sets the current selection mode.

method.name: set_tab_size
method.description: Sets the tab size for the [TextEdit] to use.

method.name: set_tooltip_request_func
method.description: Provide custom tooltip text. The callback method must take the following args: [code]hovered_word: String[/code].

method.name: start_action
method.description: Starts an action, will end the current action if [param action] is different. An action will also end after a call to [method end_action], after [member ProjectSettings.gui/timers/text_edit_idle_detect_sec] is triggered or a new undoable step outside the [method start_action] and [method end_action] calls.

method.name: swap_lines
method.description: Swaps the two lines.

method.name: tag_saved_version
method.description: Tag the current version as saved.

method.name: undo
method.description: Perform undo operation.

If [code]true[/code], shortcut keys for context menu items are enabled, even if the context menu is disabled.

String value of the [TextEdit].
Base text writing direction.

signal.name: caret_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the caret changes position.

signal.name: gutter_added
signal.description: Emitted when a gutter is added.

signal.name: gutter_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a gutter is clicked.

signal.name: gutter_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a gutter is removed.

signal.name: lines_edited_from
signal.description: Emitted immediately when the text changes. When text is added [param from_line] will be less than [param to_line]. On a remove [param to_line] will be less than [param from_line].

signal.name: text_set
signal.description: Emitted when [method clear] is called or [member text] is set.

The caret's width in pixels. Greater values can be used to improve accessibility by ensuring the caret is easily visible, or to ensure consistency with a large font size. If set to [code]0[/code] or lower, the caret width is automatically set to 1 pixel and multiplied by the display scaling factor.

The size of the text outline. [b]Note:[/b] If using a font with [member FontFile.multichannel_signed_distance_field] enabled, its [member FontFile.msdf_pixel_range] must be set to at least [i]twice[/i] the value of [theme_item outline_size] for outline rendering to look correct. Sets the [StyleBox] when in focus. The [theme_item focus] [StyleBox] is displayed [i]over[/i] the base [StyleBox], so a partially transparent [StyleBox] should be used to ensure the base [StyleBox] remains visible. A [StyleBox] that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty] resource. Note that disabling the focus visual effect will harm keyboard/controller navigation usability, so this is not recommended for accessibility reasons.
Sets the [StyleBox] of this [TextEdit].
Sets the [StyleBox] of this [TextEdit] when [member editable] is disabled.
